item.description:
Mark your Calendars!!!!!

Its the THIRD ANNIVERSARY of the founding of the Providence Collective!!!!!!

Technically the date is a week off - its actually the 15th, but when have minor details stopped us? Let's celebrate downtown at this brand new pub on Orange St between Waybosset & Pine Streets. In the true Collective way, I happened to pass by this brand new place earlier this week. It has a great atmosphere, a large, well-stocked bar and is centrally located near McFaddens, 10 and P-Collective fave The Red Fez. Not too big, and not too small, its going to be a great one to know about! In true Collective tradition, we'll start off there or stay, whatever strikes the mood. Its been an amazing three years!!!! Come downtown, and let's celebrate with a great evening of fun and  socializing with friends old and new!!!!

http://www.facebook.com/thecongresstavern

Hope to see you there!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm still deciding on which scarf - maybe I'll break out the blue fuzzy one - keep posted!
item.name: Providence Collective 3rd Anniversary Celebration!!!!!!
